column5: Well, the puppy is nearly a year old. The wife has been hounding me to get him groomed. All because he likes rolling in the manure pile at the farm. He won't geting any bigger than 10-12lbs, unless we let him get fat.   Personally, I think he is cuter as a fur ball.
Cute as a button either way Bruce, but he's a handsome dog, groomed.
Yup, I agree, cuter as a furball.  What a sweetie
